name: Caveman School GRUFF CREATOR
description:
Create the Gruff of your dreams in Caveman School GRUFF CREATOR, the newest instalment in the Caveman School franchise! Make a 3-legged Gruff, or maybe remake a popular video game character as Gruff!

Special thanks to these people who have special cosmetics of their creations in this game:

  • ninjamuffin99
  • PhantomArcade
  • evilsk8r
  • KawaiSprite
  • Toby Fox

Share your Gruffs in the comments! Just screenshot and save your screen, then crop it so it's just your gruff!
